name: Top PUA
description: This is an LVG, a GALGAME, a visual novel, a super hilarious game. This story happend in Mainland China. In this game, our protagonist Willie dated a top pick-up artist Lilie. That girl is 30 years old, and she is 4 years older than Willie. Although she is pretty young, but she know everything about dating with a man. In this game, we can see a splendid psychological game between them. Because in Mainland China, the number of male is 3 billion more than female, so it is really hard for a man to find a wife, therefore, male has to spend lots of money on dating. Sometimes, some gold diggers know this, so they pretend to date with poor guy and cheat their money. This game is just a story about this kind of thing. This game is developed by an open source engine, all scripts, pictures, videos, music are not encrypted in any way, you can DIY by yourself, modify the plot, translate into various languages, or write sequels, and you can also email us your DIY results, we will be very grateful.
